name: Adverline
overview: Adverline has been performing the Advertising Network activities on the Internet since January 2000. Adverline was able to position itself and stand out: by building up its technological independence on proprietary software capable of adapting to the ongoing evolution of formats and optimizing online advertising campaigns by concentrating on topics that include travel, entertainment, education, telephone services, etc. by creating professional products and services that cannot be turned down by advertisers who want to reach attorneys, doctors, craftsmen, BTP professionals, business managers, etc. by attracting aspiring sites with great potential, thanks to a mutualized AdServer that is totally free and easy to use This unique positioning allows advertisers and their media planners to access original, targeted offerings which are very productive and reach nearly 18 million unique visitors every month.
